comments: Disable Two Factor authentication for a user.

params.name: userId
comments: The Id of the User for which you're disabling Two Factor authentication.

params.name: mobilePhone
comments: The Two Factor code used verify the the caller knows the Two Factor secret.

params.name: method
comments: The Two Factor method used to verify the code.

params.name: code
comments: The Two Factor code used verify the the caller knows the Two Factor secret.
